page.title: 02M5 Junction 10 Traffic Count
page.content: Twenty pupils conducted a traffic survey at the junction 10, M5.,on June 20,1985, @ 11.30a.m.Pupils counted all vehicles for 15 minutes, with the classification: cars(C), lorries(L), vans(V), coaches + buses(B), motorcycles(M). {North bound carriageway: Inside lane C50, L66, V09, B01, M05. Middle lane C83, L28, V12, B01, M01. Outside lane C26, L02, V03, B01, M00. {South bound carriageway: Inside lane C68, L70, V20, B00, M00. Middle lane C109, L15, V08, B00, M01. Outside lane C39, L00, V00, B00, M01. {Leaving Mway }C31, L15, V07, B00, M01. {Joining Mway }C33, L12, V04, B01, M01. {'x'ing Mway bridge}C74,L17,V12,B01,M02 The hourly rate of traffic flow was 2476 vehicles per hour.
